name: Press 2 to Tango
description:
Time your shots and dodge bullets as you take back the Wild West from a crew of villainous cowboys!

How to Play:

Use your arrow keys to move, jump, and duck to dodge attacks and use "2" to fire back at your enemies.

Some enemy projectiles can be destroyed, such as cannonballs.

Additional Info:

This game was originally made in 24 hours. As such, that version has a few bugs and missing features.

I plan to release future versions alongside this one, filling in the things I couldn't add in tine.

CREDITS:

Music: "Fastest Gun in the 8-bit West" - OkamiDeluxe

I did everything else lol
